summary:
Ibiza, a Spanish island in the Mediterranean, is famous for its vibrant nightlife and electronic music clubs. It's the second-most populated of the Balearic Islands and has three main towns: Ibiza Town, Santa Eul√†ria, and Sant Antoni. The island's highest point is Sa Talaiassa, standing at 475 meters.

Known for its summer parties, Ibiza also promotes family tourism. It is a UNESCO World Heritage Site and is often referred to as the "Pine Islands" along with its neighbor, Formentera.
title: Ibiza
